üÜï Microsoft Azure AI Engineer (AI-102)

Issued: January 2025

Certification Overview

Advanced certification for developing, deploying, and maintaining AI solutions on the Microsoft Azure platform. Demonstrates expertise in Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Machine Learning, and responsible AI practices.

Key Competencies

  • Azure Cognitive Services - Computer Vision, Speech, Language Understanding
  • Azure Machine Learning - Model training, deployment, and management
  • MLOps on Azure - CI/CD pipelines for ML models
  • Responsible AI - Fairness, reliability, safety, privacy, inclusiveness
  • Knowledge Mining - Azure Cognitive Search integration

Practical Applications

  • Design and implement AI solutions for enterprise clients
  • Deploy and monitor ML models at scale on Azure
  • Implement responsible AI practices in production systems
  • Integrate cognitive services into business applications

Credential ID: Microsoft Certified Professional

üêç AI Programming with Python Nanodegree

Completed: November 2024

Program Overview

Comprehensive nanodegree program focused on Python programming fundamentals for artificial intelligence and machine learning applications, with hands-on projects and real-world implementations.

Core Curriculum

  • Python Fundamentals - Advanced Python programming concepts
  • NumPy & Pandas - Data manipulation and analysis
  • Matplotlib & Seaborn - Data visualization and plotting
  • Neural Networks - Deep learning implementation from scratch
  • PyTorch Framework - Modern deep learning development

Capstone Project

Built and deployed a convolutional neural network (CNN) image classifier using PyTorch, demonstrating:

  • Image preprocessing and data augmentation
  • CNN architecture design and implementation
  • Model training, validation, and optimization
  • Transfer learning with pre-trained models

Repository: CNN Image Classification Project

üß† DeepLearning.AI Complete Specialization

Completed: August 2024

Specialization Overview

Comprehensive 6-course specialization covering the complete spectrum of deep learning, from fundamentals to advanced applications, taught by Andrew Ng and leading AI researchers.

Course Breakdown

‚úÖ Neural Networks and Deep Learning

  • Fundamentals - Logistic regression, neural network basics
  • Deep Networks - Forward/backward propagation, parameter optimization
  • Implementation - Built neural networks from scratch in Python

‚úÖ Improving Deep Neural Networks

  • Hyperparameter Tuning - Learning rate, batch size, layer optimization
  • Regularization - Dropout, L2 regularization, batch normalization
  • Optimization - Adam, RMSprop, momentum algorithms

‚úÖ Structuring Machine Learning Projects

  • ML Strategy - Bias/variance tradeoffs, error analysis
  • End-to-End ML Projects - Data collection to production deployment
  • MLOps Best Practices - Versioning, testing, monitoring

‚úÖ Convolutional Neural Networks

  • CNN Architectures - LeNet, AlexNet, VGG, ResNet
  • Computer Vision - Object detection, face recognition
  • Transfer Learning - Pre-trained model fine-tuning

‚úÖ Sequence Models

  • RNNs & LSTMs - Sequential data processing
  • Attention Mechanisms - Transformer architecture fundamentals
  • NLP Applications - Language modeling, machine translation

‚úÖ Generative AI with Large Language Models

  • LLM Fundamentals - Transformer architecture deep dive
  • Fine-tuning Strategies - PEFT, LoRA, instruction tuning
  • LLM Applications - Text generation, summarization, Q&A systems

Practical Applications

Applied learning through hands-on projects implementing:

  • Image classification systems for production use
  • Natural language processing pipelines
  • Generative AI applications with modern LLMs
  • End-to-end ML project lifecycle management

Credential: DeepLearning.AI Specialization Certificate

‚öôÔ∏è MLOps Production Lifecycle Certification

DeepLearning.AI Professional Certificate
Issued: May 2024

Program Overview

Comprehensive certification focused on production machine learning system lifecycle management, covering the complete journey from model development to production deployment and monitoring.

Core Competencies

Production ML Systems

  • Model Deployment - Containerization, orchestration, scaling
  • Monitoring & Observability - Model performance, data drift detection
  • CI/CD for ML - Automated testing, validation, deployment pipelines
  • Model Governance - Version control, approval workflows, compliance

MLOps Infrastructure

  • Platform Engineering - Kubernetes-based ML platforms
  • Data Pipeline Management - ETL/ELT for ML workloads
  • Feature Stores - Centralized feature management and serving
  • Model Registries - Centralized model lifecycle management

Production Challenges

  • Model Drift Detection - Data and concept drift monitoring
  • A/B Testing - Safe model rollout strategies
  • Rollback Mechanisms - Production incident response
  • Performance Optimization - Latency, throughput, resource efficiency

Real-World Applications

Applied certification knowledge in building and operating:

  • ml-platform - Complete MLOps infrastructure on Kubernetes
  • Fraud Detection System - Production A/B testing implementation
  • Financial ML Models - Enterprise-grade model serving
  • Monitoring Stack - Comprehensive ML system observability

Certificate: MLOps Production Lifecycle Professional
